title: OpenAI's New Model, Presidential Debates, and EV Tariffs
summary:
Kara and Scott discuss the Senate's new AI "Roadmap to Legislation," the Biden administration's tariffs on Chinese EVs, and Mark Zuckerberg's 40th birthday bash. Then OpenAI and Google reveal their latest AI models and features. Should we be worried about our AI future? Plus, President Biden and former President Trump are set to face off in two debates â€” Kara is excited and Scott has concerns. Finally, a listener mail question on setting kids up for the financial road ahead.
